GSP28prakp11u:12: na vidanti ye samagraṃ kṛpayā tadanugrahaḥ kriyate // 1 // 1071//

GSP28prakp11u:52: bhūyāṃso yadyapi svārthāḥ padānāṃ te pṛthakpṛthak /

GSP28prakp11u:92: saptānāṃ padānāṃ saptaiva śaktaya iti kalpanālāghavam /

GSP28prakp11u:99: na ca vākyāntyavarṇavācakatvavādināṃ padaṃ padārthasya vācakam /

GSP28prakp11u:115: atra keciccodayanti---nanu vṛddhavyavahāraprayukte vākye padānāṃ vācakaśaktyavadhāraṇameva nopapadyate /

GSP28prakp11u:124: tathopalabhamānasya caiva vimārśo jāyate---sambhāvyamānānanvitārthapadaracanamidaṃ vākyaṃ kathaṃ prayojyavṛddhasya arthaniścayaṃ kṛtavat ?

GSP28prakp11u:180: padārthapratipādanañca vākyārthapratipattaye prayuktānāṃ padānāmavāntaravyāpāra iti ca,
GSP28prakp11u:193: saukāryādākāṅkṣitena yogyena sannihitena cānvitaṃ svārthaṃ padaṃ vaktīti vyutpattirāśrīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:211: tarhi kriyāmātrāvagame 'pi yatra kārakajñānena prayojanaṃ nāsti,
GSP28prakp11u:213: anuṣṭheya tayā hi kriyāyāmavagatāyāṃ kārakamantareṇa tadanuṣṭhānānupapatteḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:215: vartamānāpadeśādau tvananuṣṭheyatayā nāsti na kārakajñānena prayojanam /

GSP28prakp11u:336: śrutārthāpattavapi tatraiva tasyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam, na śabde /

GSP28prakp11u:339: savikalpakalpakajñāneṣu pūrvapratīyamānatā ca śabdasya nātīva pramāṇavatī,
GSP28prakp11u:353: prakaraṇādivaśena ca viśeṣāvadhāraṇādartha eva ca paripūraka iti,
GSP28prakp11u:387: yathāpramāṇāntarāvedye vastani kasyacid yogyatāvadhārayituṃ na śakyate,

GSP28prakp11u:643: ucyate---abhihitānvayavādino 'pi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ---śrūyamāṇa eva pūrvapūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārasahito 'ntyo varṇaḥ padārthapratipādaka iti,

GSP28prakp11u:672: iha tu kraya eva sarvakarmakaraṇāvacchinnaḥ pratipādyate /

GSP28prakp11u:736: tenānvitaṃ śrautārthameva padaṃ svārthamabhidhatta iti darśanarahasyamidam /
GSP28prakp11u:742: kathaṃ punaranvitābhidhāyināṃ padena svarūpamātraṃ smārayituṃ śakyamityāha---

GSP28prakp11u:923: kintvākārabhūtā jātirvyaktervyatiriktāpi vastusvabhāvena vyaktimantareṇa na pratītimanubhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:940: cihnābhāvena ca kriyānvayāsambhavādākṛtiviṣayatve śabdavyāpāra iti niścīyate /

GSP28prakp11u:1022: apūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vedavākyānāmartha iti sādhayitukāmaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ tāvadāha---

GSP28prakp11u:1080: tathā-vṛddhasya pravṛttihetubhūtā buddhiḥ---dharmiṇī yadviṣayā buddhirmama pravṛttihetubhūtā tadviṣayaivāsyāpīti---sādhyo dharmaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1084: anena mama mānāntareṇa tu yadviṣayā sā buddhiḥ pravṛttihetubhūtā,
GSP28prakp11u:1087: mama tu mānāntareṇa tad bodhyata iti---ayamāvayorviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1094: tatra buddhvā pravṛtto 'haṃ kiṃ tāvat svayamanyadā // 4 //

GSP28prakp11u:1109: piśitacakṣuṣo mānuṣā vayaṃ neyatīṃ pramāṇabhūmimavagāhituṃ kṣamāḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1121: tasyāśca puruṣavyāpārarūpā svargādibhāvyāvacchinnā bhāvārthakaraṇikā śrauta-smārttā-cāraprāptapadārthajanitakaraṇopakāravatyārthabhāvanā samānapratyayavācyā viṣayabhūtā---iti /

GSP28prakp11u:1141: tadapyanupapannam---śābdabhāvanāsu sarvaśabdānāṃ svata eva kartṛtvāt viniyogānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1151: svādhyāyāṃ hi sphuṭaṃ karma sākṣātsaṃskriyate ci saḥ” //
GSP28prakp11u:1155: saṃskāraparyavasāyī tu saṃskāravidhirna saṃskāryasya kāryaṃ kalpayet /
GSP28prakp11u:1174: na ca preraṇotpattau śabdakartṛkāyāṃ karaṇībhūtajñānānugrahayogyatā tasya śakyate 'vagantuṃ /
GSP28prakp11u:1182: ata eva tasminpakṣe niṣphale 'pi preraṇāsiddheḥ pravṛttissyāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1190: evaṃ tarhyaśrute prāśastye tadapekṣā mā bhūt /
GSP28prakp11u:1203: tathā ca na śābdabhāvanā vidhiriti siddham /
GSP28prakp11u:1210: saṃyogajasya ca dravyatve sati śabdasya nabhasā sahāsambhavāt tasya ca traividhyaniyamāt,
GSP28prakp11u:1261: sarve dhātvarthāśca kasyacidabhūtasya bhavane 'nukūlatāṃ bhajantaḥ karotyarthatāmāpannāḥ karotinā praṣṭum,
GSP28prakp11u:1266: api ca saprayatnakriyeṣu devattādiṣu vyāpārabhedasambhavāt ghaṭetāṃ praśnottare /
GSP28prakp11u:1291: api ca “pākaṃ karoti devadattaḥ” ityatra tāvatpacyarthaṃ pākaśabdo bravīti,
GSP28prakp11u:1305: yastu---“devadatta odanaṃ pacatī“tyādau vṛddhavyavahāre eva prakṛtyarthātirikte prayatne prayogādāravyātānāṃ tadarthatāmāha /
GSP28prakp11u:1311: nanu prābhākarā api bhāvanāvācakatāṃ na kathamāravyātapratyayasyecchanti /
GSP28prakp11u:1313: kintu kāryābhidhāyino liṅādayaḥ kāryasyānyathānabhidhānāt kṛtyabhidhāyina iṣyante /
GSP28prakp11u:1314: kṛtisambandhi hi kāryaṃ kṛtyanabhidhāne nābhihitaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1330: na cāsau parakṛtisambandhi svayaṃ kāryaṃ boddhumalamiti,
GSP28prakp11u:1350: tatra na kriyāmatraṃ tāvadahaṃ budhvā pravṛttaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1390: tathā pravṛttirapi tanmātrāvagamāyattā na bhavatītyupekṣyaiva tāvat taṃ,
GSP28prakp11u:1392: 1254phalasādhanatā nāma yā sā naiva ca kāryatā /
GSP28prakp11u:1402: kintu svayaṃ kleśarūpaṃ karma yatkāryatāṃ vrajet // 8 //
GSP28prakp11u:1408: kintu kṛtiṃ prati pradhānabhūtaṃ sat yat tadadhīnasattākam,
GSP28prakp11u:1419: na tasya kṛtiṃ prati prādhānyāvagamo1257 ghaṭate /
GSP28prakp11u:1445: ta eva kāryāvagatiṃ kurvantīti śabdāntaravalliṅādīnāṃ kāryavācakatvavyutpattisiddhiḥ // 10 //
GSP28prakp11u:1446: nanu lokavyavahārāt liṅādayo vācakatayā vyutpādyamānāṃ praiṣādiṣvevavacakatayā vyutpattimarhanti /
GSP28prakp11u:1451: pravarttyapuruṣāpekṣayā jyāyasā vaktrā pratipādyamānaṃ kāryaṃ praiṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1464: vastutastu praiṣādīnāmapi 1267pravṛttyavyabhicāritvātkāryasya ca pravṛttiṣu sarvāsu hetubhūtatvātpraiṣādiṣvapi liṅādīnāṃ kāryamevār'tha iti niścīyate // 12 //
GSP28prakp11u:1489: loke hi liṅādiyuktavākyaśravaṇe viśiṣṭakriyānuṣṭhānadarśanāttadviṣayā kāryāvagatirliṅādibhiḥ kriyata iti yuktam,
GSP28prakp11u:1496: liṅādiśravaṇe tu tathābhūtārthaṃparatayā1272 dhātuḥ prayukta ityavagamya,
GSP28prakp11u:1510: tena yadyapi lokānusāreṇa kriyāyā eva kāryatayā bodhyamānāyā vākyārthatvāt,
GSP28prakp11u:1520: tena tatsambandhātsādhyabhūtaṃ svargādi kāmyamānatayā puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi---
GSP28prakp11u:1531: na ca tasya sarvasya sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1536: dṛśyante hi grāmābhigamanakāmā 1280api yādṛcchikīṣu kriyāsu pravarttamānāḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1542: anyathā hi tatkāminā satā tatkāryatayānavabuddhaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1560: na ca teṣu svarūpanibandhana eva tatprayogaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1574: tadānuguṇyena tādaśyāmeva prītau svargaśabdaḥ prayukta iti niścītate /
GSP28prakp11u:1580: ata eva ca vinaṣṭasyāpi karmaṇaśśāstreṇa sādhanatvaṃ bodhata iti ye bruvate,
GSP28prakp11u:1582: evaṃ cāsāvāśutaravināśinī kriyā svargakāminā niyojyena saha kāryatayā sambandhuṃ nār'hati,
GSP28prakp11u:1589: tena tasyā api niyojyasaṃbandho ghaṭata eva /
GSP28prakp11u:1611: devatāprasādasya phalaprayojakatvaśaṅkā 1293nanu yāgādikriyā devatārādhanopāyabhūtā satī kāryatayocyatām,
GSP28prakp11u:1619: na hi devatārādhanopāyabhūto yāga ityatra kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP28prakp11u:1628: na ca pramāṇāntareṇa devatāsādhanopāyatā ayāgasyāvagamyata ityuktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1638: devatādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] ca prapañcenāyamartho nirasta iti,
GSP28prakp11u:1646: śabdato vā puruṣasaṃskārahetutā yāgādīnāmavasīyata iti “karmāṇyārambhabhāvyatvādi” [mī. da. a. 11. pā. 1 sū. 20] tyatroktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1650: tadanyathānupapattyā tu kiñcidapyaparaṃ tañjanyaṃ phalodayānuguṇaṃ kālāntarasthāyyātmāśrayaṃ parikalpyatām,
GSP28prakp11u:1655: na ca kriyājanyenānyena phalajanakena kalpitena kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatopapāditā bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:1656: na hi sādhanasādhanaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1659: vyāpārayogitayaiva śaktimatāṃ sādhanatā yataḥna cā'tmasamavāyyarthāntaraṃ karmaṇāmavāntaravyāpāraḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1668: ṣaṣṭhādye tasyaiva kāryasya svasambandhitayā bodhyassvargakāmādirniyojya iti vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1670: tasya ca kāryasya niyojyaviśeṣaṇībhūtakāmyotpattihetutvamiti bādaryadhikaraṇe [mī. da. 3. 1. 3] rāddhāntitam /
GSP28prakp11u:1671: tacca tathābhūtaṃ kāryaṃ kriyārūpaṃ na bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1673: devatārādhanamukhena tāvat phalasādhanatā nāstīti devatādhikaraṇai [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1675: karmaṇaḥ, tacktervā sthāyitā neti cāpūrvādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 2. 1. 2.] pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1676: ato niyojyānvayamukhena mānāntarāpūrvamātmasamavāyi kāryaṃ liṅādibhirabhidhayata ityanekanyāyasādhyam /
GSP28prakp11u:1731: tacca prayojanākaṅkṣitayā prayojanībhūtena sādhikāreṇa niyogenānvīyata iti,
GSP28prakp11u:1775: viṣayānuṣṭhitau satyāṃ siddho na hi vidhiḥ phalam /
GSP28prakp11u:1815: anyathā yadi kaścitkalpite phale na pravartate,
GSP28prakp11u:1826: tatraitadeva tāvadvaktavyam---na kevalaṃ vede lokavyavahārādeva śabdārthāvadhāraṇam,
GSP28prakp11u:1829: etacca yavavarāhādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 1. 3. 5.] vyutpāditam 1329vyavahārata eva sambandhāvadhāraṇādubhayathāpi padāntarārthādhyavasānaṃ bhavatyeva,
GSP28prakp11u:1852: sitetara iva tveṣa pakṣaścittaṃ na karṣati /
GSP28prakp11u:1876: kāryamātrārthatve kriyaiva kāryatayā liṅādyartha iti niścīyate,
GSP28prakp11u:1881: tadā tasyāssvayaṃ duḥkharūpatvātpuruṣārthāntarānubandhanaṃ vina pravṛttyasambhavānniyamena sukhārthinaḥ pravṛttirna syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1889: phalaṃ vinā ca tadanupapatteḥ phalāvagamamapi sambhāvayet /
GSP28prakp11u:1891: sa eva vālyadaśāyāṃ vyutpannassvayamācāryapadavīmadhiruḍho vedārthaṃ pratītya,
GSP28prakp11u:1899: sarvathaiva1341 yato loke kriyā kāryaiva gamyate // 40 //
GSP28prakp11u:1906: apūrvaṃ hi kriyāsādhyaṃ sādhitā sādhanaṃ kriyā /
GSP28prakp11u:1915: yattu śrautapadārthe kārye loke liṅādi na prayujyata iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1919: sādhitā ca satī kriyā sādhanaṃ bhavatītyapūrveṇa saha kriyākāryatvaṃ1345 nityasambaddhamiti,
